Yes, something with their name which may give to some certain audience something like bad perception of overall thing out there but I do not see how it will be happening lately. So can we do something better with that or not ? How else you can check that much ?

Review Title: Maybe I simply do not like the name‚Ä¶
Review Text: Maybe I simply do not like the name itself, which good brand located in USA or something close to economy or something like that will call itself like Banana Republic which means third world country anyway for whatever reasons out there ? So it should be done. Or redone.

Review Title: Shocking what this company is allowed‚Ä¶
Review Text: Shocking what this company is allowed to get away with. After luring new customers into signing up for their mailing list with promises of discount codes, these codes never materialise and even though your inbox is then cluttered with their recommendations, the staff deny your email address is even registered. No wonder they closed every UK store as they are rapidly going down the toilet.
1st , I love banana republic and have been using the perfume W for 30+ years. Now the perfume smells like alcohol, no scent at all not even a hint of the old product. Sad to say bye.

Review Title: Sizing of Products Is a Hot Mess!
Review Text: Sizing of men‚Äôs products is a mess! I used to buy online quite a bit, but the past couple years it has become inconsistent and confusing! I can‚Äôt even figure out my size in the stores anymore. The fits have names associated with them that hurt not help you figure out what you should try on, and often means you have to try the same shirt or pant in too many sizes. Also, they have made all the sizes smaller, even an XXL shirt is smaller than an XL in most brands. Quality has become super inconsistent too, becoming Old Navy with higher prices.

Review Title: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE VIA PHONE AND‚Ä¶
Review Text: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE VIA PHONE AND IN-STORE! MGMT MORE IMMATURE THEN OTHER EMPLOYEES STATED WAS NOT FIXING ISSUE HIS STORE WAS REASON FOR MESS UP! WILL NOT BE SHOPPING/ORDERING PRODUCTS DUE TO EXPERIENCE!!

Review Title: It took too long to get my money back
Review Text: It took too long to get my money back, i had to email them several times with proof of my refund AND my order in the first place, and even though i gave them the order number, they "couldn't find" my order. At last, several months after, i got my money.Way too much worrying, not worth it.

Company do not refund unless you send several emails and proof of posting.  Even using their own return label,  checking on tracking that item delivered next day they do not refund.  In the end all you get is an apology for the delay in processing refund but no explaintion.  Waited almost a month for monies to be refunded this week. This is not a one off.

Buyer beware, Banana Republic may not refund you for your returns as they believe it is a courtesy to do so. They are also the rudest company I have ever dealt with and refuse to apologize for their shortcomings. Overall Banana Republic offered me the worst customer service that I have ever experienced and they seem to think it‚Äôs not important.I had to return two shirts as they were too big. I went into the returns section on their website and they sent me the shipping label. I returned the product using the shipping label they provided and I have tracking of the product saying it was delivered. I emailed the company after a couple of weeks querying the delay with the refund. Approx one month later Banana Republic emailed me to say that they could not see the details of where it was delivered in the UK but out of courtesy they would issue a refund. Out of courtesy! I explained that this was not an issue of courtesy and that I had followed their returns directions and used the shipping label that they provided so if there were any issues with the delievery then that was their problem with the shipping company. It is not a courtesy get your money back when you follow the companies own procedure! I would liken Banana Republic to scam artists based on this.They also do not forward complaints to senior managers despite several requests to do so; or else the senior managers are just as clueless and horrible.If I were you I would avoid Banana Republic altogether they are obviously unprofessional, rude and don‚Äôt understand their obligations or their responsibilities. More importantly they may not refund you for your returns!Please be careful of Banana Republic, the dodgiest purchasing experience I have ever had to endure.

Excellent!  I would recommend this company to anyone.  Their clothing, shoes, and jewelry are well made.  They offer petite and taller sizes.  They offer simple tailoring services.  Their staff is attentive and professional.  The people that work here and their managers are always positive, appear to be listening, and seem genuinely concerned about anything you present to them.  Everyone seems efficient in processing any kind of transaction, such as purchases, returns, and exchanges.  No one ever seems bothered by working, even at their busiest times of year.  Always a great, stress free, shopping experience across all stores I've been to.  Thank you, BR!

Review Title: Good for buying dress clothes I shop‚Ä¶
Review Text: Good for buying dress clothes I shop here often for a deal on shirts and pants for work

Review Title: I've had a fantastic experience while‚Ä¶
Review Text: I've had a fantastic experience while shopping during sale times. The standard  delivery was super fast. The prices are decent, but sizes are all over the place and huge. Typical for American companies catering for big people. Not great if you're European. I'm a size 8 at 1.73, and xs is too big for me. The cut is not great - too big in waist and to narrow  in shoulders and not fitted on a female body (all clothes were boxy as if fitted in barrels. Perhaps these were the trends this season) The customer service was excellent.

SCAM ALERT: DO NOT GET THIER CREDIT CARD! It may be a scam. I have been trying to pay it every which way for a couple months and its impossible. They call everyday with an automated message, but when you try to get through it it disconnects, sounds like they sold my debt to some other firm while I am trying to pay. So dont think your info is safe when they have it. I didnt get the card so I cant make an account, they claim my Zip is wrong. I cant get a real person. Im sure the interest rate is terrible and now its hurting my credit. All for a pair of pants. Buyer beware, might not be worth the 20% off or whatever the sign up deal is in not worth it. I would have gladly paid the 40 bucks or whatever it was.
I loved working at he store in regent street as evryone was so friendly and my manger Richard was the best.

I ordered some shoes they arrived really quickly but, they were very small. So I tried to call banana republic to change them, the phone numbers on their website were wrong. So I mailed them, it takes over 2 days for them to answer a mail!   Now I've retuned the shoes, they've had them for over 10 days, but tell me refunds take up to 30 days.... Won't be using again, a waste of time and energy.

Review Title: Their return policy is the worst-‚Ä¶
Review Text: Their return policy is the worst- strict 30 days. First day counts from shipping date. Will not even allow straight exchange for same item but different size. Called customer service twice and store- absolutely no exceptions.Will never shop at any of their stores- Old Navy,Banana Republic or athletica.  Very surprised they are not bankrupt!

Their website is quite clear to me and that's the most important thing for me as for a online purchaser. I don't even doubt the quality of t's and hoodies they sell, because I've been wearing Gap since my childhood and they never set me up in terms of quality. The tissue is pleasant to the body, delivery was quick and promotion sales which they arrange from time to time are atractive too. It's a good chance to pluck something interesting by a small price.

Review Title: I am a lifelong GAP customer
Review Text: I am a lifelong GAP customer. I shopped in their Scottsdale store in July 2023 and loved the experience of shopping there! This store is the only GAP in the state of Arizona. They need to be more diligent at checkout.

Let me start off by saying that I absolutely love Gap but this 3rd party they‚Äôre using for the courier LaserShip is the main reason behind this review. They claimed to have delivered my package at 12:31pm yet I have no activity on my ring camera from 11:28am-1:08pm no package & someone was home to accept it . I guess the thought never crossed their mind to ring the bell either. I reached out to LaserShip & they did nothing but tell me to contact Gap so I did.  I then did research on this 3rd party courier only to see that the reviews are HORRIBLE which explains the issue I‚Äôm having along with others. Gap hasn‚Äôt done anything to resolve or accommodate me as the customer because they continue to use them as a courier. Moral of the story is moving forward I will no longer patronize the Gap because I‚Äôm out of money & merchandise and they still got paid so they‚Äôre winning the couriers who are stealing is getting paid to deliver ‚ÄúBUT AREN‚ÄôT‚Äù & is getting the merchandise the customers have paid for!!! If I could give Gap & LaserShip 0 stars I definitely would because I feel they‚Äôre working together.

I ordered three items, one was not delivered which they helped because they didn't do their job correctly. The other two items I wished to exchange for other items (not get money back) but I was told too bad it's past the 30 days no exceptions. I have had some family issues, and they were a little more important than remembering to exchange items within the 30 days, but the gentleman I spoke with didn't care. 'You are out of the 30 day exchange period, nothing we can do'I guess they truly care about their customers..I will not be shopping with them.

Review Title: I purchased three hoodies for a girl‚Ä¶
Review Text: I purchased three hoodies for a girl for over $57 on August 13th. I was told that the package would be shipped online through UPS on Sunday, Monday and then by Tuesday the package was noted to have a claimed filed by the sender which is Gap. And I called the customer service number and I contacted Gap Outlet on Facebook. I was told to wait until the 24th of August and to call on the 25th even though UPS had the package shipped from Tennessee by the 18th and it never moved or was updated since the 18th. By the 21st, UPS noted to file a claim and that it was just not available to be delivered. That's odd. But, Gap Outlet refused to pay me a full refund for the $5 shipping. So, I got $52 instead of $57+ for a refund. I would add photos

Review Title: Good looking out for your customer
Review Text: Good looking out for your customer. Some stuff the quality is so so but most stuff is good and my kids like a lot of the clothes I get so do I

I called spoke to a Supervisor who told me nothing she could do, its 15 business days for them to even process the refund (card refund may even take days after that), even though they were the ones who screwed up in the first place.Beware.

I bought some tee shirts while on vacation in Honolulu. I was so disappointed at the quality of the shirts after washing. They are so wrinkled and looked like I slept in them. Won‚Äôt purchase any more items, their quality has really gone down hill.

Deemed my return was late because it didn't arrive before 30 days, even though in the past I have successfully returned many orders as long as I mail them out within 30 days. Review Title: Ask to send you a fax, Gap. It's so 1983!
Review Text: I'm just curious - what else does it take to make a simple purchase of basic clothes? What else do I need to 'have in hand' - my mother's paper address book? "Your recent order #XXXXX has unfortunately been cancelled due to a potential fraud alert. If you would like to replace the order or learn more, please call us at 1-800-GAP-STYLE (1-800-427-7895) and ask for ‚ÄúResearch.‚Äù Have your credit card, billing address, and phone number as it appears on your credit card statement available".

REWARDS MEMBERS, LAST DAY FOR FREE 12/23 DELIVERY! ICON SPEND $50+, CORE/ENTHUSIAST SPEND $100+.  Not an option a scam to get you to purchase no one on chat or through customer service number 800-427-7895 can get you that shipping.  Horrendous experience somehow within an hour though your items are being processed and they cannot be cancelled.  Happy Holidays to you

Review Title: Return Policy is from Shipment Date not Delivery Date
Review Text: I usually have no problems returning items, but this time I learned the hard way that Gap has a unique return policy. I ordered clothes then had to take an unexpected business trip. I thought to myself that I would have plenty of time after returning from the trip to return my order and did not make that the focus while trying to get ready. I learned today that Gap's shipment policy is 30 days from shipment date and not delivery date, so I missed the window for returns of items that don't fit me. For what it's worth, I ordered on May 31 and received on June 6. Since some orders take up to ten days to receive (and probably will be longer if the UPS strike occurs in August), I just don't find this a fair policy or one that is the norm. I imagine I'm not the only one who relied on consumers norms and got burned. For that reason and a few others not mentioned here, I will not be ordering from Gap again. And I'll be figuring out what to do with these clothes I won't wear and can't return.

Review Title: If I could give 0 stars I would
Review Text: If I could give 0 stars I would. Ordered 4 items; none fit so started return process. They had me return the items to Staples rather than (normally UPS!) The items were returned 3/3/23. No further tracking dates available (just said package was delivered after about 2 weeks!) I have called 5 times and was told each time the return would be processed on 3/24. Called today (3/24), still no info on return. Asked to have it escalated and finally got the refund issued. However, email says it will take 10 days for refund to post to account. Unbelievable, 4 weeks to process a refund. I have been a very long time GAP customer and never have I experienced such awful customer service.

Unbelivably badNINE people spoke to in three calls and 2 attempts for them to get the order right - I eventually gave up tryingToo tired to explain the nightmare - th website is full of bugs - ignores shipping address updates and repeat calls result in no resolution of a simple orderOH and their" rate your experience after the call" doesnt work either - NO WONDER THIS BUSINESS IS CLOSING ITS STORES AS IT SLOWLY COLLAPSES

Such a disappointment. Hopefully you are happy with your product because forget about an exchange or return. It's slow, full of mistakes and by the time everything is said and done the product you actually want won't be in stock any more. They will however give you 15% off to make up for it. Ridiculous considering you can get a better coupon at anytime.

Review Title: I recently placed an order still waiting  on 11/1/2022‚Ä¶
Review Text: I recently placed an order on 11/1/2022 as of today 11/18/2022 I still haven‚Äôt received it.  No tracking info since 11/7/2022.  I did receive an email on 11/16/2022 from Gap asking me to write a review on my purchase experience. Since I never received my order I left a review expressing my displeasure with their company. Review Text: Buyer beware-Men's Cargo pants on sale are not so great-had a pair of the mens cargo pants tear on 3 pockets after wearing 2 times-only had them 2 weeks-then the other pair tore in several spots after 3 weeks was on chat online with GAP for over an hour to get a replacement & all they would offer was 20% off a pair of $59.99 cargo pants-never agan-I don't do business with places like that esp who waste my time!!Filed acomplaint with the BBB online & GAP still tried to get me to delete comments as well as pay $29.99 plus shipping! No deal! Stuck with 2 pants no good now-never again shopping there-poor customer service!

Terrible return policy.  Tried to return something just past the 30 day return date.  Didn‚Äôt realize gap had changed their return policy.  Tried returning in store and online.  No exceptions. received item from online order 3/18. returned items 3/23. it is 4/17 and I still have not received my credit. compare this to amazon. I just returned an item from an amazon to the ups store yesterday. got a text 5 minutes later that my account has been credited. I have had two mentally exhausting chats with a gap representative and have sent multiple emails. NO response. At this point I have reported it to my CC company. maybe they can get somewhere. Alas, I may be out $200.00. will never shop at gap again. Been reading that they are going out of business.

Review Title: Avoid them unless you enjoy being frustrated!
Review Text: Every time I have a transaction with Gap.com, it seems I have a problem. I ordered shirts to be sent to gift recipients and neither order was ever sent. Tracking just showed it was picked up but it never moved from there. I had to call customer service and have them re-order the shirts and have them sent again but they made me provide a credit card to re-purchase. They finally sent the packages and the order was wrong. I ordered three shirts and they sent one and the shirt they sent was the wrong size!  I called them to rectify the situation and got a very rude CSR who lied about issuing a refund for the missing shirts and then made me give my credit card to re-order them.  AGAIN. Come to find out they never issued a refund for the missing shirts, they just charged me again for more shirts.  The absolute worst customer service with a language barrier that only exacerbates the situation.  I disputed the charges on my credit card because after two phone calls to Customer Service, all I got was more lies and no resolution.  The Gap online SUCKS!! Bring your customer service back to the US where it belongs!

Terrible custom service, can not get adequate reimbursement for the mistake in sending, which happened because of the service itself. I don't think this is normal and can't recommend this service for use.

Review Title: I was supposed to receive an e-gift‚Ä¶
Review Text: I was supposed to receive an e-gift card for the balance of a gift card purchase.  The email did not arrive.  I called GAP customer service.  The moron on the phone kept me on hold for almost 30 minutes back and forth before admitting that he could do nothing about gift cards.  He then stated that the balance was my loss.  I demanded to speak to a supervisor, who (after another 30 minutes on the phone) agreed to issue a new card.  Of course, he made an error and instead of issuing an e-card he sent a new plastic card via UPS.  It never arrived.  After two weeks I initiated a chat to demand a replacement.  Customer service kept me on chat for an HOUR only to admit they would have to 'forward' the info to the gift card department for resolution.  They said I could copy the chat once we disconnected as proof, but it disappeared as soon as they did.  I called back on the phone and demanded to speak to a supervisor.  Because I was angry, the rep had the nerve to tell me that I was acting "unprofessionally" - as if they had done anything but.  They also refused to let me speak to a supervisor, so I had no choice but to hang up, two hours of my time wasted with no resolution.

Review Title: Please for the love of all things good‚Ä¶
Review Text: Please for the love of all things good fix your app and website!!!!!!!!!!!

Review Title: I ordered trousers and after two months‚Ä¶
Review Text: I ordered trousers and after two months and several follow-ups, I have not received them. Called their customer service and they say contradictory things. Very Disappointing!

I ordered a hoody which came in the wrong size.  When I called to exchange it I was told that I would have to pay again for a new (correct) one, pack up the incorrectly sized one,  and drive the wrong sized one to UPS  to ship it back,  I would get  a refund when the first one was received back and, I would not have to pay shipping.   I think, at the very least, the wrong one should be picked up and I should not have to expend my time and gas when I did nothing wrong.

Review Title: I am very disappointed with The Gaps‚Ä¶
Review Text: I am very disappointed with The Gaps return policy.  I tried returning an item which was just over 30 days.  I was unaware that The Gap has changed their return policy as I never had this problem in the past.  Although they will not refund me for the item, they would not even give a store credit.  I cannot understand why they would not give a store credit?  Who is your Marketing Manager?  How do you turn down your customers.  You would think the customer would use the Credit on another purchase and perhaps buy other items.  Sorry Gap, you lost another customer.  Keep it up, you will not be around too long!!

I have never shopped Gap online or in store prior to a few weeks ago. I ordered some baby items online (matching bodysuits and pants). I also ordered a few Old Navy items at the same time, since it's a joint website. The items from Old Navy arrived in two days and all together, neatly wrapped and packaged, obviously from a fulfillment center. The items from Gap (according to tracking info) were sent separately, apparently from various stores (had I known this I wouldn't have ordered). The shipping said they would arrive in 3-5 business days. I received several separate emails regarding the individual items saying "we're so sorry for the delay, but we don't know when your item will arrive" and another that said "awaiting cancellation". On EVERY item I ordered from Gap. So, I called. The item "awaiting cancellation" wasn't available. Ok fine, then please don't send me the matching pants. Well, that's not possible, but you can send them back for a refund. Two of the items eventually arrived and were obviously someone's return, no tags and dirty. So, I returned all three of these items via their express returns at Staples (we do not have a Gap store nearby), and two weeks later, no refund yet. The last item still hasn't made it. It was supposed to arrive on Feb. 3, but now has a date of Feb. 9. They did refund that item since it doesn't appear to actually be moving away from where it was sent and towards it's destination, per tracking. Overall, I'm still stuck with half outfits due to items not being available or having not arrived. I will NEVER order from Gap again. I was offered a 15% off coupon to compensate, however I declined because all the frustration is simply not worth it. All the bad reviews I've read seem to deal with this same issue.

Horrible return policy. Their return policy is 30 days form the date the order was shipped. Not form the day the customer receives the goods??!!! I wanted to return toddler hoodie. I received it on January 6th. I went to the store in Oak Brook il on February 3rd and was refused the return. The item shipped on January 3rd. The return window closed on February 2rd (30 days). Really one day?!! They cannot offer the store credit. I ordered the bigger size of the  hoodie, so I didn‚Äôt need the smaller size anymore. I had no idea that they do such a problems with returns. So many other stores l buy offer customer friendly returns. Or at least offer store credit. I‚Äôm not a Gap happy customer anymore.

The online chat customer service is terrible. They sent me a faulty dress (ripped at the seam) and refused to refund it and wouldn‚Äôt allow me to speak with a supervisor and then hung up on me. I‚Äôve shopped here for years and never complained but will not shop here again.

Review Title: I ordered a 3 pack of baby shorts
Review Text: I ordered a 3 pack of baby shorts. Only 1 came in the mail with no tag. I called and they wanted me to send the 1 pair back to get the other shorts I purchased. I‚Äôm really upset. They even asked for my credit card?! Like you‚Äôre going to charge me shipping again- to receive an order you never sent? NEVER AGAIN. They can kick rocks.

Review Title: When you make a mistake don't make me fix it!
Review Text: My order was shipped in three different packages.  No big deal, except that in the end, I received a duplicate item and didn't receive an item that I had ordered.  Their solution?  Send back the duplicated item and then repurchase the item we failed to include.  My solution?  Send me the item you omitted  and let me just keep the duplicate ($6).  Why do I have to run to the UPS store to return your mistake and then reorder the item you forgot and wait another week for it to arrive? Also, you tell me that my credit could take up to 15 days for the item I'm returning.  Unacceptable.

Review Title: I ordered 9 items at the same time and‚Ä¶
Review Text: I ordered 9 items at the same time and they send it by batches. And having an issue with my second and third parcel. I tried reaching out their costumer service but they did not even bother to help and contact the courier. So they just take your money and if theres some problem they will not even bother to help you. Not going to order again.

I ordered for the second time using PayPal.This time Paypal paid the correct amount.Gap has my card number from my first order so they took an extra 38.49 from my card.The customer service number is no help at all,they know nothing. I would advise everyone to not buy anything from gap online.

Review Title: Never again gap will rob you for item‚Ä¶
Review Text: Never again gap will rob you for item they cancel and still charge you

Review Title: Gap no longer stocks clothing for small people
Review Text: I have been a loyal gap customer for many years. I will no longer shop at this store. They used to be a store  where I could find my size online and return things if they did not fit.I am not sure who made the decision, but they no longer stock clothes for small people. All their small sizes sold out well before Christmas. Now they are trying to unload overstock of large sizes.Their policy is a scam. They only allow 30 days for returns, but that 30 days includes shipping time, so you really only have days to return things. I am not sure who started making these decisions, but they lost me as a customer. I now shop at Nordstrom and Abercrombie.

Review Title: I ordered clothes for my grandson‚Ä¶
Review Text: I ordered clothes for my grandson online from Gap Factory and was told the clothes are the same as The Gap. They are not.The clothes from The Gap Factory are oddly fitted and are of very poor quality as compared to The Gap.I live in Long Beach, NY and have shopped in The Sands Plaza Gap for 20 years or more, and found out recently they switched to The Gap Factory without warning. There is an old saying that goes "If it is not broken, don't fix it."  Every other store is the Gap except the one in Oceanside, NY.   The stores in Merrick, NY and Roosevelt Field have stayed the original "Gap."Please note that while prices may be cheaper at The Gap Factory the quality of clothes are definately not the same. They are much inferior. Shop at your own discretion.

I received an email this morning (Dec 20th) that I had cancelled an order I placed on Nov 29th, which is not something I actually did. I tried contacting customer support about this, but after several minutes of non-answers I started the process of closing my account out of concern that someone had accessed it. (This is not an easy process and I don't trust that it's been completed.)Several hours later I received an email that a technical error meant the order wasn't available and that they cancelled the order on our behalf. The email was written as if it effected more than just me. I'm not sure why they feel that 10% off an order that will likely not arrive in Christmas is an appropriate response to this mistake, especially when I had almost an entire month I could have shopped elsewhere if they had let us know about this "technical mistake" earlier. The quality of their clothes are barely worth the price (and never worth full price) and they are definitely not worth the headache.

REWARDS MEMBERS, LAST DAY FOR FREE 12/23 DELIVERY! ICON SPEND $50+, CORE/ENTHUSIAST SPEND $100+.  Not an option a scam to get you to purchase no one on chat or through customer service number 800-427-7895 can get you that shipping.  Horrendous experience somehow within an hour though your items are being processed and they cannot be cancelled.  Happy Holidays to you

Such a disappointment. Hopefully you are happy with your product because forget about an exchange or return. It's slow, full of mistakes and by the time everything is said and done the product you actually want won't be in stock any more. They will however give you 15% off to make up for it. Ridiculous considering you can get a better coupon at anytime.

The worst customer service.The worst shipping service.I have ordered twice in the past 6 mons and both didnt get delivered ontime.I ordered a xmas gift which ETA is 12/16 with $17 express shipping and I got ETA today with the tracking number which says ETA 12/20!!!! It was shipped out on 12/9 and ETA 12/20 with  extra $17 express shipping fee... which is supposed to be 2-3 days delivery time. The chat customer service is useless. They can not do anything until it gets delivered. This is sooo horrible!!!! They cant even contact UPS to expedite the shipping. Why did I even paid $17.... No more shopping at Gap.

Review Title: Not received my package and not resent as customer office said
Review Text: Gap sent me an email said that my order was delivered on Dec 1st at my front porch. We checked after half hour, it was not there, we have monitor at front porch that didn't show anyone drop the package around deliver time. I called customer service, and they said they will resend it and I should get on Dec 6, otherwise call them on Dec 7. Today is Dec 7, I didn't get anything from them either, I called them, they agreed to give me refund. I waste all the time buying the items online and all three times to talk to them. I do not trust them anymore. Hope I can get my refund,  who knows! I tried to ask them to transfer my call to their supervisor, but the line never get through.. and I waited and waited, no one pickup the line, at the end the line witched me to survey line :(

Review Title: Return policy is strict and unforgiving, not the Gap I remember anymore
Review Text: I‚Äôve been a faithful Gap customer for the past 10 years and I‚Äôm disappointed on their customer service and return policy now. They are no longer for the customer.Their strict 30-day return policy is a JOKE! Other brands within their partnership (Old Navy) give you some grace period for returns so I am shocked that Gap had now placed such a strict hold on 30 days, NO exceptions.I have to order a lot from online because they don‚Äôt carry my size in store and now I am stuck with 6 pairs of jeans that don‚Äôt fit me.30 minutes on calls with different customer service agents and no one has any power to override anything, not even a manager. I feel bad for them not being able to help their customer and the ones who have to deal with our frustration. It‚Äôs not good for anyone.

I ordered some items. One was a sweater. It was too large for me. So I called them and the gal said I couldn't return it, because  it was 40 days. Most stores will let customers  return things even 60 days after ordering.  I asked to speak to her supervisor,  and she disconnected me. I called again, and I was speaking to a rep, and all of a suddena voice cuts into our conversation and it was an automated survey of my experience.  The cs rep was no longer connected to me. Very very poor customer service.  I will never order from Gap again and will tell my family and friends to avoid Gap too. Horrible.

Review Title: There is no service in their "customer service"
Review Text: I placed an order on November 20th and on November 30th received an email telling me the order was delivered. It was not delivered to my house. I called customer service and was told both that the items were delivered and that the items would be delivered by 12/14. I was told to wait and if I didn't get the package by 12/15 to call back for a refund. Not satisfied with this response I checked with the delivery agent (UPS). Their on-line tracking shows that the package was indeed delivered on 11/30 but to a guy named Steve at his house. I have his address and the only thing it has in common with mine is that it is in the same state. So I called customer service again to tell them that there is no sense in my waiting for a package that Steve is now enjoying and to ask for a refund. I was again told that their system will not allow a refund to be processed until December 15th. I filed a lost package complaint with UPS and will see which corporate giant resolves this matter quicker. In the meantime, I'll do the rest of my Christmas gift shopping in brick and mortar small local businesses.

Review Title: Gap refused to give me a refund because‚Ä¶
Review Text: Gap refused to give me a refund because my return was 34 days after delivery. That is a terrible policy at the holidays. I‚Äôll never shop there again.

Review Title: Their pricing scheme is a scam
Review Text: Their pricing scheme is a scam. The same hoodie that was $30 original price in the spring and that I bought for $15 on sale is now listed for $69 and as a major sale for $27.

I did receive an email on 11/16/2022 from Gap asking me to write a review on my purchase experience. Since I never received my order I left a review expressing my displeasure with their company. Called customer service reps overseas india cant understand a word they say and they don't know what they are doing. had a return omg

the guy asked me like 1000 questions to verify my  identity, while not revelaing his own, and ultimately gave me the response exactly what I can see online. It was a useless support, and waste of time to call them.

Review Title: Never spending a cent with this company again
Review Text: I will never purchase another item from this clothing company.  Terrible customer service and return policy. Rude and not helpful in any way.

I ordered a pair of pants online through Gap Factory for my son. I received an email stating that the pants were being processed for a return, which I never requested a return because I needed the pants. I called the customer service phone number. I was told that they gave the pants to another customer who also ordered them and processed a return for the ones I ordered. I never wanted to return the pants. The Gap will never get my business again.

As a lifelong Gap shopper, I'm super disappointed to be writing this review. I purchased two dresses online to choose one for an upcoming wedding. They arrived on separate days. The Gap has changed its return policy to 30 days FROM the SHIP DATE! One of the dresses took 15 days to arrive, and I shipped it back to the GAP within 48 hours. It also took another 15 days to get to their warehouse - using the return label that they generated for me. They refused to take it back and shipped it back to me with a note that said they received it after their 30-day window. Considering 30 days was *literally* spent shipping, I am now stuck with a $100 dress that does not fit me right. I reached out to customer service, and they gave me 20% off my next purchase. This was during the pandemic when everything was being delayed with shipping - and my family and I had COVID when it arrived, so I could NOT actually return it to the store. (It seems like during this time of such upheaval, you'd be considerate of your customers - and at least offer store credit if you are going to change your return policy so drastically.) Long story short - I cut all my credit cards up and have boycotted them all together.

Review Title: GAP, Zero consideration for your customers
Review Text: I live 5 hours from the city so I do my shopping online. I placed an order on 9/17 to receive by 9/20. Received an email today (9/21) that my order was out of stock and my order was canceled. Called customer service and was told by Lisa they didn't know why it was canceled that it was in stock. She was going to re-place my order with 20% off and overnight it to me. Perfect. Except we lost connection while I was on hold. I made contact with customer service a 2nd time, he (don't know how to spell his name) read the notes and was going to do the same. Again, lost connection. 3rd attempt I was on the phone with (Grace) customer service for 40 minutes while she attempted to understand and place my order. I was finally put through to a Lead (Erin) who did not know why my order was canceled and told me that I could reorder but would not be able to receive it before the 28th. Not good enough Gap. I placed the order on the 17th because I needed it for a wedding I'm attending on the 25th. Why was my order canceled? Why is it impossible to stay connected to your service team? Why can't they return a call or contact after a chat is disconnected? You've left me with no time to order elsewhere. Zero consideration for your customers.

Review Title: They don‚Äôt show the right numbers
Review Text: When I was checking out it said 53$, free delivery and then it added delivery charges and charged me like 63$ without me authorizing it.

Review Title: Buyer beware if you're ordering online from Gap.com ‚Ä¶
Review Text: I placed an online order with Gap.com for a white jeans jacket on July 20, 2022. Received an unrelated item from them on July 23. On July 27, I called to return it and get what I had ordered. They received the return on July 28 and 10 days later they have not issued a refund. I spoke with customer service today and was told it may take until August 16 to process the refund. That means that they would have had my money for 27 days ... totally unacceptable! I noticed others have had the same issue with getting their refund. Gap is making more $$ off of delayed refunds than selling clothes.

If you are wronged by this company and they are not giving you a refund, please contact the FTC and file a consumer complaint. Also, contact the BBB. Maybe even the AG in your state, Delaware (where Gap is incorporated), and California (where I believe the headquarters are). What they are doing to customers is not right at all. I used a prepaid label they sent me to return a YZY Gap item. They received the item like two weeks ago as per tracking and I still do not have a refund. Customer service are useless. Even a lead was not helpful. Then a few days ago an offshore agent said my issue would be escalated and somebody would call me back. They never did. I have been shopping online for years now and never ever has a refund taken this long. I expect to be refunded the full $156.19. They are scammers and hope that people will not check their bank statements so they can just keep the money.My throat even hurts from talking with their agents nonstop and trying to explain myself and having to phonetically spell out my name and order number. This is awful. Worst service ever. I will NEVER shop with them again. This is worst than ordering stuff from companies abroad.

Review Title: worst customer service in the U.S.
Review Text: I ordered 2 dress online and received my order not only late but both dress still have the store plastic security tags attached!!! I spent hours trying to remove it and hurt myself so I contact customer service and request a printed return label to send to so I can return it. They refuse and said company policy do not send out printed return label to customer. I already told them the nearest store to me will be hours for driving so I need to return it by mail but I don't have a printer to print, they still refuse to send me the return label and demand me to drive hours to the store to have the plastic security tags remove from store. They are using overseas CS for online chat so they do not care how their customer felt and they don't care about return customer.

Review Title: I've always loved this store & their‚Ä¶

Their prices aren't low, but they're worth it because they'll last long time due to the great quality. And you can always take advantage of sales/deals via email sign up.

Review Text: Women's sweat pants and other types of pants have very narrow legs! They are not cut for American women! If you wear a large the leg width needs to be cut larger as well!!

Review Title: Beware of their 30 day return policy

I was 4 days past their 30 day window so they returned the item to me. I choose Target and Amazon now over this. They have great return policies-convenient and no questions asked most times. Gap just said sorry they disappointed me and now I‚Äôm stuck with $70 jeans that don‚Äôt fit. Ugh!

Suddenly super shady? I have been shopping at Gap since I was little. Now they are doing some seriously weird fraudulent things when shopping/returning online. I sent in a return a month ago, it was received in like 15 days ago and I have not gotten a refund. When I tried to contact customer service, I was told to keep waiting. When I asked to speak with someone who may be able to have some flexibility, I was put on hold for over an hour before I hung up. I ended up having to file a dispute with my credit card company.

Worst customer service.  I had a few orders different over time that was missing items... the most recent is a chambray dress. I received several packages as the order was split (worst idea). I however need to contact my credit card company and dispute the missing item. I found that very distasteful and fraud. My credit card company had nothing to do with the order. Gap got paid for something they never delivered. Gap stores too. Unhelpful associates and management. Never going back.

Review Title: I would give the Gap website a negative‚Ä¶
Review Text: I would give the Gap website a negative ten if I could. There are far too many smart capable techy people on this planet. Hire one of them or shutdown your pathetic website. I think I attempted to change the location of the store I wanted twenty times!

Ordered 3 hoodies from YZY gap (childs small, childs large, adult large). I received 2 childs L and 1 childs xs. Contacted customer service and they said out of all 3 order numbers not one was valid. How does that happen? Never again.

I ordered 3 jackets and a hat on Nov. 29, 2021. I received that order on Dec. 4, 2021. One of the jackets I ordered was missing out of the package and there was a pair of joggers I didn‚Äôt order inside instead. I contacted gap customer service and was suppose to be emailed a return label and a discount code for my next purchase and I was told I would receive my refund in 3-5 business days. That email never showed up so I had to call back and explain that whole situation again! This time I was sent a return label and the discount code, that I tried to use to reorder the same jacket but it did not work. Also, on this call the customer service rep said it would be 10 business days for my refund. I mailed off the item that was sent accidentally, not my fault, it was their mistake. I waited the allotted time and still no refund. I waited a couple of days, called again and now I was being told 15 business days and they have record of the mistaken item being received at their dock on Dec. 16, 2021. Now I‚Äôm getting frustrated. I then called again after the winter break in January 2022 and this time I‚Äôm being told 20 business days plus an additional 3-5 business days for my refund to hit my account. Now it‚Äôs January 18, 2022 and I still have not received my refund. I have never dealt with this kind of issue with gap. They have outsourced their customer service and it has went down hill tremendously! If you check their reviews and complaints on BBB, you will see so many people having the same issue when it comes to refunds from Gap inc.

Very shocked by all the negative reviews! I've purchased from GAP, Athleta, Banana Republic and Old Navy for years with no problems. Just two months ago, I made a huge order between all 4 brands and returned a lot of stuff to back. All the returns were accepted in a reasonable amount of time and I got refunds for every package.I find the quality of clothes from all the brands to be pretty sufficient for the prices being charged. I mostly love Athleta's style.Lastly, I recommend staying away from buying the YZY collab hoodie. While I've always enjoyed purchasing from GAP and the other brands, fast shipping, fast returns and never had problems, I can't say the same for their YZY merchandise. I ordered the hoodie for someone and it took 2 months to arrive. The quality was like Walmart quality, not very creative, the back of the hoodie was plain, it was $10 shipping, fit way too small, and lastly, if you try to return it to a GAP store, they won't take it. Apparently, it's shipped by a third-party merchant who prints the hoodies, not GAP. That would explain the poor quality and why a $90 hoodie cos $10 to ship when GAP normally gives free shipping after $50. If you try to return it online, you basically go through a headache trying to hound for an answer since the package comes with no invoice or any return labels.Overall, I've had pretty good experiences with GAP (and other brands) so that's why I gave them a 5-star. They could mess up here and there but they never gave me major problems.

Review Title: I bought a sweater in Destin in‚Ä¶

Review Title: AVOID AT ALL COSTS! You may not get your order!
Review Text: I ordered a few hundred dollars worth of merchandise and Gap/OLDNAVY split the order up: 1 shipment with 14 items, 1 shipment with 1 item (a shirt). LASERSHIP is their preferred free shipping service. Almost immediately it showed shipment 1 as 'DAMAGED and UNDELIVERABLE, contact the shipper'. I contacted LASERSHIP many times with no reply and couldn't speak to a live person. They sent two standard canned responses but never followed up. GAP/OLD NAVY customer service would NOT give me a refund nor make good on the order by sending a replacement order. They said I would have to wait until the listed shipping date passed before they would give a refund. Never mind that not one person could tell me what happened to my package. Most of my experience with normal trusted shippers, not these lowest rated shippers in the USA called LASERSHIP, involved them always delivering a package even with damage. What exactly happened to a box of clothes that made it so damaged it couldn't be delivered? Destroyed in a fire? Water damage? Theft? Who knows?! GAP/OLDNAVY didn't care, only sent an email to LASERSHIP with no followup to me as promised! So me a customer left in the dark, money left on 'hold'. OR did GAP/OLDNAVY damage the package??!! WHO KNOWS??!! LASERSHIP amazingly did get the one shirt delivered on time!! WOW!!!! Imagine them doing their jobs! The bulk of the order, the other package deemed 'DAMAGED & UNDELIVERABLE' was sent back to the GAP by LASERSHIP and never to me. I called and got the refund after the shipping date passed and I didn't receive anything, although it took a few days to process. RUN from the GAP, OLDNAVY, BANANA REPUBLIC!!! If you do order from them, don't use their FREE SHIPPING if it's only with LASERSHIP! Use UPS or FEDEX IF they offer it! I will never shop at these stores again! Thanks for nothing and over 50 years of being a customer!! You are the worst retailers I know of in 2021!

Review Text: I‚Äôve had a really good experience shopping with GAP online. All of my clothes fit true to size. I‚Äôve shopped here over 10 times and never once have I been satisfied with my Clothes the material is wonderful!

Recently pre-ordered the yeezy bubble jacket in June and the company took my money for the product. The item was finally shipped out in November and Recently before that I received some from products from gap a few weeks ago.  But this item didn't make it too me ups transferred it to usps and gap had the mailing address wrong from my billing address so it was returned to sender after making it all the way her to my city. I contacted gap them and ask them to resend it back out customer service hung up twice and then third time said they would just refund me my money and when product is available to reorder but the product was a limited edition and sold out. They still ignored me saying that and just issued a refund and gave me a 20 percent discount. So after holding my money for 6 months I still didn't receive the product and they didn't care to make sure I got it as well. Very upset about how they handled things and maybe one day something will be done.

Review Title: If I could give a 0 I would put it
Review Text: If I could give a 0 I would put it, worse customer service ever it‚Äôs been almost a month I purchased and returned it the same day as it came and still haven‚Äôt got my refund. Called the customer service and what one tells you one day the other one tells you different very disappointed ‚òπÔ∏è

Review Title: I recently purchased a small Kids‚Ä¶
Review Text: I recently purchased a small Kids Recycled Wool Peacoat for my 10-year-old daughter and was disappointed by how paper thin the garment was considering I shelled out $86, including shipping. When I received an email from the Gap inviting me to write a review, I clicked on the link, but all it did was prompt me to purchase other items without any guidance whatsoever on how to post a review. It's no wonder. Their average is barely 2 stars! As a single dad with sole financial responsibility for my kiddos, every dollar I earn must be spent wisely. This is a big disappointment. The hard part is my daughter likes the coat, even though I doubt it'll keep her very warm. My suggestion is to bypass the Gap in favor of one of its competitors.

Today I had to talk and ask some questions regarding my recent order transaction issue and I called them. A lady opened the phone and she was programmed to not to understand what I was saying. I am an international speaker, so I can get that she may not understand at the first time. However, she made me repeated the same thing at least three times and she interrupted me several times while I spoke. So I could not explain my problem. After that I felt that it was very humiliating because I don't think my sentences were hard to understand. I told her I am trying to explain what happened if she lets me. Then, she suddenly complained that I was the one who was not being polite. It was so bad because she made me feel bad about the incidence, she was so reluctant to solve the problem and at the end I said that ok I understand what's going on and she hanged up the phone in a rude way. I haven't seen this type of handling at the other brands' customer services. I hope Gap hires more professional people to their customer service.

Review Title: I recently shopped at the gap
Review Text: I recently shopped at the gap. The staff were kind and there were a lot of discounted items. The prices were very reasonable. For my taste, they don't have many items that I would consider pretty, but when I need basic clothes, I go to the gap.
I purchased what I thought were high quality hoodies. The Gap photos deceived me. The color is off and the garments are floppy.
Missed delivery.Really annoyed. delivery didn't turn up.

Review Title: Been a Gap Customer since  they first‚Ä¶
Review Text: Been a Gap Customer since  they first opened up a store in NYC in the early 80‚Äôs ‚ù£Ô∏èLoyal to the Gap family :- Old Navy in Avon commons,. Athleta, Gap, Banana Republic, in Westlake Crocker Park is also a favorite haunt . The ladies @ these stores are absolutely fabulous and go over & beyond for their customers ‚ô•Ô∏è Thank you Natasha from Athleta .com sales for helping me place an order , can‚Äôt wait for my items ‚ù£Ô∏èüôèüèªü§û You are definitely not a Lulu Lemon üçã ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüçãOmmmm & Namaste , U most definitely put me in my Zen Zone üôèüèªüßò‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüôèüèª

The Gap is now using the Lasership company for package delivery, I have complained to Gap to no avail but want to let people know how this goes. The Lasership company uses local delivery people who drive their own personal cars with no signage or marking that this is a delivery company, the cars creep around the neighborhood looking for the right house and then a random person gets out with no name tag or credential badge on and tosses the package onto the porch. This has happened multiple times and I have observed this in person. The latest situation happened yesterday and led me to plead with the Gap to re examine who they use as a shipping vendor. A white mini van creeped on my house then parked at the end of my driveway and a little boy approx 9 or 10 years old got out of the van holding a gap package and proceeded to walk up the driveway. I thought perhaps my package had been delivered to the wrong house and he was just bringing it by, when I asked him he said no, my mom drives me around and I run the packages to the house. This is just awful. Hmmmm the Gap prides itself on doing the right thing for women and children and the environment and under developed countries but this is the worst, child labor! I have tried complaining to the Gap and was offered a 10% discount code for my troubles. I refused that because I don't want to be pacified, I want to know they are going to fix this!!! Do better Lasership and do better Gap!!!

Review Title: BE CAREFUL WITH MARKDOWNS - ALL IS NOT AS IT SEEMS
Review Text: Bought a T-shirt marked $29.95 from the Sale stock at the Encinitas store that was supposed to have an extra 40% off. They put it through at full price until challenged - that's their job, surely they should be able to do it without the customer having to make sure there's no overcharge?Secondly, the $29.95 orange sticker T-shirt, when we peeled back the sticker, was originally $17.95. So, GAP are marking up to make back down, if they remember to reduce it as they say they will. No wonder the stores are in financial trouble. Apart from one more visit to return the fraudulently priced item, that'll be the last time we go there.

Used to be known for high quality fashion. Ordered hundreds of dollars worth of school clothes for my granddaughter, broken into 3 orders... sent by 3 different carriers (1 I‚Äôve never even heard of) and that ONE doesn‚Äôt ship to PO Boxes but the others do. So nowww I have to go looking for this place if I want my package!

Review Title: Can not return in store if bought at Gap.com
Review Text: I ordered 2 pairs of jeans on line, they were not true to the size and way to big. I looked on the site and it said I could return to the store or online. I was going to a town 76 miles away and decided to save the hassle of mailing and waiting 30 plus days and just return in store as their policy states you can. Well, this store refused to do a refund because the Lady stated "we don't sell "long" jeans and we do not do returns for Gap.com". She recommended I drive another 30 plus miles to another Gap store to see if maybe they could do the return. I am just mailing it back and hoping that the amount they show on their return is not the amount they refund or else I am losing money there too. I paid more than they say I did and I have my printed email to prove it.

Unbelivably badNINE people spoke to in three calls and 2 attempts for them to get the order right - I eventually gave up tryingToo tired to explain the nightmare - th website is full of bugs - ignores shipping address updates and repeat calls result in no resolution of a simple orderOH and their" rate your experience after the call" doesnt work either - NO WONDER THIS BUSINESS IS CLOSING ITS STORES AS IT SLOWLY COLLAPSES

Review Title: I won‚Äôt ever buy from babyGap again or‚Ä¶
Review Text: I won‚Äôt ever buy from babyGap again or the gap stores or any of their subsidiaries. Their customer service is horrible,they route you to a South American country ( as the rep who answered told me) which would be fine if we could communicate but the only language I speak is English so I am unable to communicate with their customer service reps. The person could not understand anything that I was saying, my order was being shipped to the wrong address and after 10 frustrating minutes that he repeated something that he made up in his head because he couldn‚Äôt understand my English, we accomplished nothing. When I kept reading the confirmation number of my order with the letter G for Girl and repeated that many times he kept saying D for dog that was just five minutes of frustration there let alone each and every word that I said he could not understand it and would repeat something completely different . When I told him my order is going to the wrong address and I just placed the order today and I needed it to go to the correct address he repeated so you want to know what date your order is arriving ?He told me that I‚Äôm calling a South American country for customer service and then eventually hung up. Although he was polite and with every sentence I said ,he said thank you for that information and repeated thank you for that information many times, with whatever information I gave him he repeated a different sentence .When I placed this order it inadvertently is being sent to me as opposed to the gift recipient and I placed this order today. I repeated numerous times that I placed this order online today as one order he kept repeating I went to a store and I placed one order there and the other order online. I have no idea what he‚Äôs even talking about . I could not resolve having this order going to the proper address so now I need to get the order &wrap it and re-ship it to the gift recipient. The whole point of me ordering baby items from baby gap was in order to have it shipped directly to the recipient. Their customer service is horrible and to no fault of the person who does not understand English but unless I spoke another language I definitely could not resolve this problem. Obviously the Gap has their customer service overseas to save money but having properly trained customer service reps who could understand the caller should be of utmost importance.

I ordered an item and waited for 3 1/2 weeks to see if it was shipped.  It took Gap 9 days to create a table and for another 8 days the package sat in the warehouse.I called customer service; they cancelled the order and reissued the order for the same item and PROMISED they would NOT use LASERship a second time for the reshipping.  Got an email today saying they are reshipping via LASERship.So the service was virtually non-existent the first time I ordered the item and the promise was not honored.  Obviously GAP is incompetent and lies to their customers.  I will NEVER shop with them again. Hope you boycott them as well.

I called gap.com several times today, only to be transferred several times and still not have them issue me the gap card discount that I always receive as a card member!!! I have no idea why they couldn‚Äôt and wouldn‚Äôt honor it?! But, I do know they don‚Äôt understand the concept of good customer service, lost a sale and possibly a customer.

Review Title: Cheap clothing, too much plastic packaging
Review Text: Cheap clothing, lots of wasteful plastic packaging.

Review Title: Decent clothes, if you can get them
Review Text: It took two weeks and a supposed re-routing of my package and then finally I get a delivered notice email at midnight... In the email, Gap suggests that I check all around my house and ask neighbors if they received it in error, if I don't see it where it's supposed to be. Gap customer service is nonchalant about the delivered status of my order, says it must be lost, offers a refund and nothing else.

Review Title: Refuse to fix their own mistakes
Review Text: I have now been sent the completely wrong item from my online order, TWICE. It's like they just send you whatever they have with no regard for what you actually ordered. Then, they make you send the wrong item in for a return and front the money for the right item (if they even still have it) when it was THEIR MISTAKE! Take some responsibility and mail out the right item to the customer right away as a courtesy. This clearly happens routinely - fix your policy gap.

Review Title: I have two kids and shop gap a lot
Review Text: I have two kids and shop gap a lot.  Mostly early morning when am up to feed the bay, On their website it says free shipping over $50. Each time I have spend over 100 plus and shop gap 1-2 times a month. I never realize I have to go in myself and pick free shipping. I just click apple pay double click the button and done. I called for a shipping refund and the lady over the phone was VERY rude and was giving me attitude. Not sure I will be shopping gap online anytime soon . They should have it like Nordstrom , Bloomingdales, macys and Nordstrom Rack where you just get your free shipping once you go over the $50. When you are a busy mom , you don't have the time to check all the details. I am just trying to shop the fastest and easiest way I can.  I spend a lot of money on gap items online and now, I will most likely take my money else where. I wish I held on to all my email recites
Love their clothes but can never redeem the Gap Cash online. I'm done!

Review Title: I paid $250 for 8 items for my daughter‚Ä¶
Review Text: I paid $250 for 8 items for my daughter from the Athleta Store (a division of the GAP), however, the size match-up was way off and I had to return all the items for a simple exchange from Medium to Large. That's it! Very simple, easy? NOPE!. I do this all the time with Adidas, Under-Armour, and other stores, and the exchanged items size are often shipped out immediately on confirmation of the returned items with those stores (I returned a top to UA the same day with the GAP/Athleta items, and I am receiving the replaced item in the same week). The 8 items I returned to Athleta were delivered within 3 business days, and I was told that it will take 7-10 business days to process and then the exchanged items will be shipped out, thus, meaning it will take at least 3-4 weeks to receive the corrected/exchanged size unless I paid to place another order for the same items (with corrected size) while the returned items are being processed, thus, tying up $500 of my money. That is insane and very backward. Not only such, but they are also very misleading in their size analysis, my daughter wears a medium from every other brand except this one. By the time this is processed, it's very unlikely I will be able to re-purchase the correct size items. What a horrible experience.

Review Title: I had the worst experience with Gap
Review Text: I had the worst experience with Gap. I made an order and waited two months just to realize the order was returned to Gap. They didn't deliver as "UPS couldn't find my apartment number" even if there is my name on the buzzer of course. After that GAP didn't bother to send me email that the order was shipped back and even didn't bother to REFUND my money. So one month after they shipped the order back (and I was checking the tracking number meanwhile) I found out all of this. GAP customer support said they are sorry and offered 20% off for my next purchase! And that's not the end. I tried to apply 20% code for the next purchase and the code DIDN'T WORK. So there will be no new purchase at Gap, Old Navy and Banana Republic ever.

Dear Gap, when you send a customer the wrong item then YOU should correct it, not leave it to the paying customer to go and do your bidding while standing in line at the post office or store to return your mistake before you will even send the correct item.  Send a return label with the correct item and make it easy on the customer.  The shipping label doesn‚Äôt even have the correct item on it.  I‚Äôm too exhausted to call your customer service back and explain to them how your trading has failed them that I will simply be disputing the charges.  If people are ordering online it is because they don‚Äôt have time to stand in line for you, or shop at the store.  This is not genius but you do need some genius because from reading the other reviews it is obvious that whom ever is in charge of your customer service practices should be fired.  A long going issue at this point.... while others are catering to online services during COVID Gap remains stagnant and ignorant of good service and reputation.

Review Title: I have had it with Gap
Review Text: I have had it with Gap.  As a single mother of 4, I shop a lot at The Gap.  With my last purchase 3 tops that I purchased for $19.99 each, before using my rewards, arrived with sale prices, two for $14.99 and one for $5.99, a difference of $24.00.  I called them and a supervisor said there was nothing they could due because I used my rewards...really, they just stole $24.00 of my rewards!

I purchased an item from GAP that had an additional 10% off promotion. I clicked the 'Tap to apply' and after the purchase was completed, I realized the extra 10% didn't come off the purchase price. I called customer service and the woman adjusted the purchase price. The item has since gone on sale, so I called to get  price adjustment and told I couldn't because one was already applied. I explained it wasn't a fault of mine, but the systems and really wasn't a price adjustment at all. Still, customer service refused and said she would have the manager look it over. I haven't heard anything back. Being penalized because the companies system was working properly is just ridiculous.
I cannot understand why the type of online payment method is so low. If I have no credit card, it is super difficult to buy things online from GAP. What is the generation now?

I ordered 5 pairs of underwear at the store, and a week later I get a notice that the pack of three are on back order? Then I received 1pair and the last pair have been stuck somewhere for weeks? I out of 5 ..... what a joke!Miserable experience.

First of all, RAY, a supposed supervisor, definitely needs training in how to deflate an upset customer. I buy a lot of merchandise from GAP, and every order, there's an issue! I only continue to shop there because my grandchildren love the clothes, however, their customer service doesn't exist. They advertise promotions you cannot use, they don't ship all your items, and you have to research what happened to them, they don't notify you. They offer absolutely no resolution to help. Shop at GAP at your own risk!
In the sales season,  very good prices.  Quickly process orders.

Review Title: DO NOT order from GAP until LASER SHIP is OUT‚Ä¶
Review Text: this is the first time i have ever written a review. The shipping service used by Gap- LaserShip is so horrendous i feel i should warn everyone. DO NOT PLACE AN ORDER WITH GAP UNTIL LASER SHIP IS FIRED.  All UPS shipments over the past several years have arrived with no issues and on time. GAP is using a new shipping company called LASER SHIP- i am now on my third day on the phone, and 5 hours into holding for GAP customer service and Laser ship has a 30 minute hold time then the agents have no ability to help--

Review Title: Horrible service when it comes to‚Ä¶
Review Text: Horrible service when it comes to delivery.  I‚Äôd placed an online order and it was returned due to insufficient address.  They forgot to enter my apt # and this is the second time it has happened.  Now I have to call shipping to track down the order and update my address?  I don‚Äôt think so!  I‚Äôll be calling customer service to vent tomorrow!  How do they expect to stay in business and compete with companies like Amazon is beyond me! UNPROFESSIONAL CUSTOMER SERVICE AGENTS LIE AND MAKE UP THINGS TO GET CLIENTS OFF THE PHONE

First of all, I have difficulty logging in even with the new password I just made. So, I had to call the customer service. The customer service was so unprofessional that it is beyond one could imagine! First of all, the first customer service representative just transferred me to another without forwarding any information so I had to explain one more time what happened. Then the second representative sounded so impatient as if he was doing me a big favor by repeating the website one more time! The conclusion is if you want to make a timely payment online, guess what, that purchase you made hasn't even been posted online! Okay, it's your fault by being ahead of them!

Hopping on the 'poor quality' band wagon. I've been buying my jeans exclusively from GAP since high school. They fit the way I liked, consistent, and held up well for how frequently I wore them. NOW: All jeans are the lame stretch denim, color fades fast and the two of the three pairs that I've owned just barely over a year have random holes popping up all over. Down by the leg, under the knee??!!, by the belt line. Pitiful. Sad, but I have no choice but to find another place to shop. By GAP RIP.
My online shopping experience was excellent. My order came within a week and was complete. As always gap has come through for me when shopping for my granddaughter‚Äôs birthday.

Extremely disappointing. It‚Äôs been over 6 weeks and still didn‚Äôt receive delivery of cloths I bough on Gap.eu. In the future I will consider other options on the market for my e-shoppping . I do not recommend Gap.Update: Received refund as delivery never arrived.

Review Title: The poor quality of GAP‚Äôs jeans
Review Text: The quality of GAP‚Äôs jeans has plummeted. It‚Äôs falling victim to the age of abundance low quality disposable clothes that only for a few months. In the last 12 months I have bought 3 jeans all of which ended up with material giving way in the crotch and bump area. Ironically I have GAP jeans bought 5 years ago that I still use frequently. Age of fast fashion and wastefulness.

Review Title: Customer Service is very very bad
Review Text: Customer Service is very very badCustomer Service is very very bad. I mean worst.They cancelled my order with no notification( wow great) They said that my CC isn‚Äôt verified whatsoever. Which I already instated to them all the details they needed which is correct. (FYI) I‚Äôm super nice while talking to her( working for many years in customer service industry. I know the stress handling guest) but wow. This is a next level. 1st. Agent ask the email and give it and she couldn‚Äôt find it. I ask her can‚Äôt you find under my name or my phone number she said she can‚Äôt.till ending up asking my home address( great that‚Äôs super weird) ow well end up not resolving the problem( take note! Super awesomely rude( don‚Äôt want to deal with it and say bye and hang up. I called the 2nd time (coz I bought gazillion of clothes for my husband) well the gentleman helped me thou and look up my order under the phone number that I am using without even giving my full name, address or some personal details( blows my brain out coz the First Lady can‚Äôt find it and boom the gentlemen just saw my order, just like a blink) he said that before cancelling the order they will call me or notify me which they never do at the first place!)( well I‚Äôm trying to be cool and don‚Äôt want to get mad coz I don‚Äôt want to waste my time( patience woooshhhh even my brain cells and my blood is moving to my mouth want to say something but trying to hold it) well he said that they‚Äôll call my bank to verify it which I understand( that‚Äôs there SOP) which I do understand. Till he get back to me coz he is trying to call the bank) well he get back saying can‚Äôt reach the bank and call me back once they did( which they didn‚Äôt until office hours is done done) well, I ask him if I can just change my CC coz I don‚Äôt want to deal with it and just to get what I ordered for my husband.( well now my ending is empty handed).I‚Äôll call tomorrow and say the word! CUSTOMER SERVICE IS about helping the customer, figure out things, give them options, cooperate and talk to them, build a friendly connection. Working as a customer service agent is pretty hard. I know you guys stress. But if you guys work in the Customer Service industry. We have no choice(you accept that job),( when you guys are stress answering the phone it reflects that you are not happy with your job)We still need to smile and move on. Review Title: I received a gift for my birthday (‚Ä¶
Review Text: I received a gift for my birthday ( wrong size)go to exchange the item and find out the nearest store is 100 miles away in either direction . Guess I won‚Äôt be a Gap Shopper anymore , sad

Review Title: More than four weeks delivery time
Review Text: I have been waiting for more than four weeks for a pair of jeans that I ordered online. They were still not delivered and the Hermes tracking just says "arrived at the national sorting hub". I am sorry to say this but you really need to work on your fulfillment. This is very disappointing.

Terrible customer service, need to return a damaged item.  Still waiting for them to send a return label - 23 days later!! Sent many emails, daily - still no further on.  Keep getting fobbed off, going round in circles

First and last online order.. product ok, too short..the return process is like a puzzle..I think they hope you'll give up, which I did! Once you finally figured it out..said my order number not correct...YES... it's the one you gave me!..Old Navy's return very similar!! Last order from me for either place!

Gap.com is a mess.  I paid for faster shipping &they still shipped it UPS Surepost instead of UPS.  This has the post office do the final delivery - adding days to the delivery time.  I called, asked for a manager, it took 3 try‚Äôs & I still got a supervisor.  GAP doesn‚Äôt appear to have good control over their logistics.  Apparently they do not have a clue.  Very disappointed - no wonder their stock is going down down down.

Ok, I realize we are in the middle of a pandemic but I ordered something on 11/30/20.  Twenty nine days later and I still have not received.  The tracking number shows no movement since 12/7/20.  It is not that Gap is responsible for shippers but they are responsible for what method they selected.  They must select parcel post because all other packages I ordered this year have arrived.  When contacted they suggest you contact carrier.  Why would you have a customer service if you can't help someone?  I personally would not ship with any carrier that I could not track.  This is "BadBusiness" and they have probably lost a lot of customers.  If I could see a glimmer of hope the package will arrive I would not be writing this review.

Terrible customer service, their delivery service AND website are in need of much work, and their quality is terribly bad. GAP is my go-to for some items, but be careful when buying off their website without viewing items in person. You will undoubtedly be disappointed, as I was. I mean, what am I talking about? They are a overpriced Target. Never again.

I bought a pair of jeans online.  I called before I returned them asking if I can return in the store.  I was told yes.  So I go to the store and they returned them however I don‚Äôt get a refund until February!!! Mind you they were never worn! Tags still on them.  So what‚Äôs the point of returning them to the store?

Review Title: I would give them a 0 star if possible
Review Text: I would give them a 0 star if possible.   I ordered 18 items on 11/26/20.   9 of them were lost in transit and showed no shipping movement since 12/2.   Called Gap last week and was told I had to wait until 12/21 before they could do anything.  Called today as items still had not arrived and they said they could issue me a return that would show up in 3-5 days and repurchase everything at my expense today.   When speaking with a supervisor was told their company never reships items at no cost to customer.  That no matter if items were damaged, missing, wrong item shipped, etc, that customer is always asked to repurchase the item(s) again as they wait for their return.  Epitome of bad customer service and I will never purchase from this company again.   Beware of this company.
Bad costumer experience.Little or none sensibility nor be willing to help. Not recommended at all. Better to shop online

Review Title: My worst experience with customer service...

She hung up the phone on me and then, she returned my order without asking me if I wanted to do so. I'm offended and feel terrible. I never buy again anything from the GAP.

Review Title: No Way to Get a Receipt, Bad Business Practices
Review Text: I have found that this company is terrible when it comes to ordering clothing online from them or any of their affiliated stores. In my past few orders from Gap, Old Navy and Banana Republic I have not been receiving an order confirmation email. When the order does finally arrive there is no sheet detailing the items that I ordered and no receipt in the box or package.  When I go to the website to look up the order, the website always takes me to a page saying there is a "Technical Difficulty." When I call customer service the people there say they can see my order, but there IS NO WAY to send me a receipt. This is ridiculous and its just bad business practices to not send or keep records of the purchases to your customers. I am no longer going to order anything online from any store related to Gap.

Review Title: My package has been sitting in West‚Ä¶
Review Text: My package has been sitting in West Chester Ohio for over a week now. They have no idea when I will get my package. I have always been so satisfied with Gap clothing and how quickly I have received my order UNTIL NOW! Once I receive this order which looks like it will be close to a month from ordering, talking to the useless people in customer service I will never order again. This can‚Äôt be blamed on Covid this is HORRIBLE customer service and Shipping with Lasership. What a Nightmare! You can keep your Gap Bucks

Review Title: Gap online orders and customer service‚Ä¶
Review Text: Gap online orders and customer service is the worst. They do not give you the Gap Cash$ and GapReward$ you are entitled to. They try to charge for shipping even if you qualify for free shipping. They scam you with online orders. They don‚Äôt allow you to cancel an order immediately after placing order. Review Text: Gap is so ancient with getting your items to you. When you order a set of pj's, they ship it out to you separately.  So top in one delivery and bottoms in another.  Now I'm sitting here with mismatched pj's only to find out gap doesn't have the items I ordered in stock??? Come on Gap, its 2020! Really!

She always repeated we can't do it.It was not the customer service that I was expecting from Gap. If this situation is not handled I will stop purchasing from Gap.

horrible online service, they sent wrong order item all the time, with no price tag , no invoices , really cheap company

Review Title: WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE & WORST E-GIFT CARD
Review Text: I purchased an e-gift card for my friend and Gap sent a zero balance card to her. Unbelievable! So embarrassing.
